<div class="fdesc">

A kind of TopicEntry that responds to a THINK ABOUT command when located
in a ThoughtManager object. These can be defined just like any other
topic entry objects, and work in just the same way as ConsultTopics.

`class `**`Thought`**` :   `[`TopicEntry`](../object/TopicEntry.html)

</div>
